data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Sironko, Uganda and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sironko, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 18,900 people living in Sironko, Uganda. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Sironko, Uganda to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,265 believers in Sironko that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gujarati people.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sironko, Uganda that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 9,438 people in the state of Sironko who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Sironko.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Sironko
